OrgName: Valero Services, Inc. and its U.S.-domiciled affiliates and subsidiaries, including but not limited to Valero Energy Corporation.
PPLoc: see link below for customer data policy and http://www.valero.com/legal/Pages/PrivacyStatement.aspx; see Valero Intranet for HR data policy or contact the organization contact above
activities: Valero Services, Inc., Valero Energy Corporation, and their U.S.-domiciled affiliates and subsidiaries (collectively, "Valero”) are in the petroleum refining and marketing industry.  Valero has operations and employees in the European Union.  In furtherance of their prospective and current business operations, human resources activities, and other associated activities, as well for the purposes of maintaining Valero’s centralized servers and databases in the U.S.,  Valero may receive human-resources-related Personal Data from the European Union about prospective, past, present or future employees, workers and job applicants and their family members, as well as about prospective, past and present customers, clients, vendors and suppliers.
industrysector:
Oil Gas Mineral -(OGS)
Oil Gas Mineral Production
personaldata: human-resources related data, customer data, vendor data: off-line, on-line, and manually processed data.
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (AAA), ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program; European Union data protection authorities (EU DPAs) for past and present Valero employees.
